fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Upcoming Events List
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to filter events by date and present them in a structured table format.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Give me a table showing all events scheduled for the next 30 days with their names, dates, and types. I want to be able to click on an event to open it up in the system.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a table with event information
Only events within the next 30 days are shown
Table includes event name, date, and type columns
Date formatting is clear and consistent
Table rows allow opening individual event records
